üöÄ Deployment Options

Option 1: One-Command (Local)

./Deploy.ps1

Option 2: Step-by-Step (Local)

./infra/scripts/build-push-images.ps1
azd up

Option 3: GitHub Actions (Automatic)

git push origin main
# Automatic build + deploy + verify

üîç Key Features

‚úÖ Automated Image Building

  • Parallel ACR builds
  • Cached Docker layers
  • Automatic retry logic

‚úÖ Multiple Deployment Options

  • Local PowerShell scripts
  • GitHub Actions CI/CD
  • Manual deployment support

‚úÖ Production Ready

  • Works in all environments
  • Full error handling
  • Complete logging

üéì Learning Path

Day 1: Learn

  1. Read: QUICK_START_BUILD_DEPLOY.md

‚ú® Summary

You now have a complete, production-ready build and deployment automation system that:

‚úÖ Builds Docker images automatically ‚úÖ Pushes to Azure Container Registry ‚úÖ Deploys with Bicep infrastructure ‚úÖ Verifies health and readiness ‚úÖ Works locally and in CI/CD ‚úÖ Handles all edge cases
